thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Smith & Nephew Sees Corporate Tax Rate On Trading Results In 20-21 Pct Range From 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Smith & Nephew Sees Corporate Tax Rate On Trading Results In 20-21 Pct Range From 2018
text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Smith & Nephew Plc:
* ‍SMITH & NEPHEW UPDATE ON TAX​ * ‍AS RESULT OF US TAX CHANGE, FROM 2018 NOW EXPECTS A CORPORATE TAX RATE ON TRADING RESULTS IN RANGE 20% TO 21% FOR MEDIUM TERM​
* ‍EXPECT FULL YEAR TAX RATE ON 2017 TRADING RESULTS TO BE LOWER THAN OUR PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF AROUND 22%​
* ‍THIS IS REDUCTION OF 4 TO 5 PERCENTAGE POINTS ON OUR PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF AROUND 25%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
